戦々慄々: (せんせんりつりつ) - (yoji) trembling with fear; filled with trepidation
戦い: (たたかい) - battle; fight; struggle; conflict
戦いを挑む: (たたかいをいどむ) - to challenge (a person) to a fight
戦い抜く: (たたかいぬく) - to fight to the bitter end
戦う: (たたかう) - (esp. 戦う) to make war (on)/to wage war (against)/to go to war (with)/to fight (with)/to do battle (against); (esp. 戦う) to compete (against); (esp. 闘う) to struggle (against adversities, etc.)/to fight/to contend/to resist
戦えば乃ち勝つ: (たたかえばすなわちかつ) - to win every battle (that is fought)
戦く: (わななく) - to tremble; to shiver; to shake
戦ぐ: (そよぐ) - to rustle; to sway; to stir; to flutter
戦わす: (たたかわす) - to compete/to vie/to contend; to make fight against another (person, animal)/to pit against/to set against; to debate/to argue
戦中派: (せんちゅうは) - the war generation
戦争の時: (せんそうのとき) - times of war
戦争体験: (せんそうたいけん) - war experience; experience of war; memories of war
戦争保険: (せんそうほけん) - war-risk insurance; war insurance
戦争後: (せんそうご) - post war; after the war
戦争戦略: (せんそうせんりゃく) - war strategy
戦争挑戦国: (せんそうちょうせんくに) - warmonger
戦争挑発: (せんそうちょうはつ) - aggression; warmongering
戦争文学: (せんそうぶんがく) - war literature
戦争未亡人: (せんそうみぼうじん) - war widow
戦争準備: (せんそうじゅんび) - war preparation
戦争犠牲者: (せんそうぎせいしゃ) - war victim
戦争犯罪: (せんそうはんざい) - war crime
戦争犯罪人: (せんそうはんざいにん) - war criminal
戦争犯罪法廷: (せんそうはんざいほうてい) - war crimes tribunal
戦争状態: (せんそうじょうたい) - (enter into, be in) a state of war
戦争行為: (せんそうこうい) - act of war; hostile act
戦争計画: (せんそうけいかく) - war plan
戦争責任: (せんそうせきにん) - war responsibility
戦争賠償金: (せんそうばいしょうきん) - war reparation
戦列復帰: (せんれつふっき) - (yoji) return to the battle line; come back to the game (on to the field); a comeback
戦利品: (せんりひん) - spoils of war; booty
戦前: (せんぜん) - pre-war days; before the war
戦力拮抗: (せんりょくきっこう) - (yoji) struggle for supremacy between evenly-matched armies (teams)
戦力組成: (せんりょくそせい) - order of battle
戦功: (せんこう) - distinguished war service; merit of war
戦勝者: (せんしょうしゃ) - victor; victor troops; conqueror
戦友: (せんゆう) - comrade in arms; war buddy
戦国: (せんごく) - belligerent country; country in civil war; warring states
戦国七雄: (せんごくしちゆう) - Seven Warring States (Chinese history); Seven Kingdoms
戦国乱世: (せんごくらんせい) - (yoji) turbulent (troubled) times; turbulent war period
戦国大名: (せんごくだいみょう) - (yoji) daimyo in the Warring States period
戦国時代: (せんごくじだい) - Warring States period (of Japanese history, approx. 1467-1568 CE); Warring States period (of Chinese history, 403-221 BCE); era of vicious competition
戦域: (せんいき) - war area; battlefield; theater; theatre
戦域ミサイル防衛: (せんいきミサイルぼうえい) - theater missile defense (defence); TMD
戦場カメラマン: (せんじょうカメラマン) - war photographer; combat cameraman
戦場航空阻止: (せんじょうこうくうそし) - battlefield air interdiction
戦塵: (せんじん) - battle dust; the tumult of war
戦局: (せんきょく) - the state of the war
戦役: (せんえき) - military campaign; battle; war
戦後: (せんご) - postwar period; period after Second World War
戦後復興: (せんごふっこう) - post-war recovery; post-war reconstruction
戦後恐慌: (せんごきょうこう) - post World War I depression; depression of 1920-1921
戦後欧州: (せんごおうしゅう) - post-war Europe
戦意喪失: (せんいそうしつ) - (yoji) lose one's fighting spirit; lose the will to fight; lose heart
戦意高揚: (せんいこうよう) - (yoji) increasing one's fighting spirit
戦慄く: (わななく) - to tremble; to shiver; to shake
戦戦兢兢: (せんせんきょうきょう) - (yoji) trembling with fear; filled with trepidation
戦戦恐恐: (せんせんきょうきょう) - (yoji) trembling with fear; filled with trepidation
戦戦慄慄: (せんせんりつりつ) - (yoji) trembling with fear; filled with trepidation
戦戦栗栗: (せんせんりつりつ) - trembling with fear
戦時下: (せんじか) - in times of war
戦時中: (せんじちゅう) - during the war
戦時体制: (せんじたいせい) - wartime regime; war footing
戦時保険: (せんじほけん) - war-risk insurance; war insurance
戦時国際法: (せんじこくさいほう) - international law in time of war
戦時産業: (せんじさんぎょう) - wartime industry
戦果: (せんか) - military gains; war results; fruit of battle
戦機: (せんき) - time for battle; military secrets; strategy
戦歴: (せんれき) - military service; combat experience
戦死: (せんし) - death in action; killed in action; KIA
